posts.title: CUP PYRAMID
posts.description: Participants will be given a set of plastic cups and must stack them to form a pyramid shape.

rules.rule1: • Participants will be given a set of plastic cups and must stack them to form a pyramid shape.
rules.rule2: • Participants will be given 2 minutes to complete the task.
rules.rule3: • The pyramid must have a solid base, with each level stacked properly and symmetrically. Once the pyramid is complete, the participant must unstack the cups and return them to the starting position.

posts.title: MUSIC CHAIR
posts.description: A classic game of musical chairs.

rules.rule1: • The event will be conducted for both Boys & Girls.
rules.rule2: • There will be 21 chairs at starting. Two number of chairs will be reduced at each stage and final stage will be conducted with only one chair.
rules.rule3: • Only the final round will be conducted with reverse runs. All other runs will be in the clockwise runs.

posts.title: MISSING CHAIRS
posts.description: In the initial stage participants form a sitting structure with chairs. Once all players are stable, the supporting chairs are removed. The goal is to maintain balance and avoid falling.

rules.rule1: • In the initial stage participants form a sitting structure with chairs.
rules.rule2: • Once all players are stable, the supporting chairs are removed. The goal is to maintain balance and avoid falling.
rules.rule3: • Participants must maintain the sitting position without collapsing.
rules.rule4: • The team that holds the structure the longest without falling wins.
rules.rule5: • If one person falls, the whole group is out.
rules.rule6: • Players can use their hands to hold onto others for support.

posts.title: PAPER FOLDING DANCE
posts.description: 2 players of the same gender stand on a large piece of paper. Music plays and players dance. When music stops, the paper is folded in half. Players must adjust their position to stay on the paper.

rules.rule1: • 2 players of the same gender stand on a large piece of paper.
rules.rule3: • When music stops, the paper is folded in half.
rules.rule4: • Players must adjust their position to stay on the paper.
rules.rule5: • Game continues until the paper is too small to stand on.
rules.rule6: • Last team standing on the paper wins.

posts.title: GUIDE YOUR FRIENDS
posts.description: A 2-player game where one guide gives verbal instructions to help a blindfolded friend navigate a course.

rules.rule2: • Blindfolded friend cannot see the course.
rules.rule3: • Guide gives verbal instructions to help friend navigate the course.
rules.rule4: • Guide cannot touch or physically assist the friend.
rules.rule5: • Friend must rely solely on guide's instructions.
rules.rule6: • Complete the course in the fastest time possible.

posts.title: LEMON & SPOON RACE
posts.description: A classic race where participants must balance a lemon on a spoon to the finish line.

rules.rule1: • Hold a spoon with a lemon balanced on it.
rules.rule2: • No hands allowed to touch the lemon.
rules.rule3: • Navigate to the finish line (set distance).
rules.rule4: • If the lemon drops, start over.
rules.rule5: • Fastest time to complete the course wins.

posts.title: LYRICAL BINGO
posts.description: It is similar like normal Bingo. Upon arrival, each participant receives a bingo card consists of some lyrics and a pen/marker. The host will start playing songs from the playlist. Pay attention to the lyrics! If you hear a lyric on your card, mark the corresponding square. The first person to complete a row, column, or designated pattern shouts 'Bingo!'

rules.rule1: • It is similar like normal Bingo
rules.rule2: • Upon arrival, each participant receives a bingo card consists of some lyrics and a pen/marker
rules.rule3: • The host will start playing songs from the playlist. Pay attention to the lyrics!
rules.rule4: • If you hear a lyric on your card, mark the corresponding square. For example, if the lyric "Tum hi ho" is played and it’s on your card, mark it.
rules.rule5: • The first person to complete a row, column, or designated pattern (like an X or full card) shouts "Bingo!" The host will check the card. If it’s correct, the participant wins a prize.
rules.rule6: • Use of mobile phones, earphones, or any online assistance is strictly prohibited.

posts.title: TUG OF WAR
posts.description: A classic test of strength between two teams.

rules.rule2: • Each team holds one end of the rope.
rules.rule4: • Team that pulls the rope to their side wins.
rules.rule5: • No letting go of the rope.
rules.rule7: • Winning team is the one that pulls the rope a set distance or makes the opposing team lose their grip.

posts.title: POT PAINTING
posts.description: A small pot will be provided to participants. The participants have to bring their own color. The participants have to complete the painting in 1 Hour. The painting will be in free style.

rules.rule1: • A small pot will be provided to participants. The participants have to bring their own color.
rules.rule2: • The participants have to complete the painting in 1 Hour.
rules.rule3: • The painting will be in free style.

posts.title: RANGOLI
posts.description: A traditional Indian art form of decoration drawn on the floor or the entrance of homes.

rules.rule1: • Both the boys and girls can compete in the event.
rules.rule2: • The colors for the rangoli will not be provided by the Cultural Club. The students have to bring their own colors.
rules.rule3: • Participant have to design the rangoli in one hour. Rangoli will be free style. The participants can’t use any frame for design the rangoli.

posts.title: MEHENDI
posts.description: A form of body art and temporary skin decoration usually drawn on hands or legs.

rules.rule1: • The event will be conducted for both boys and girls.
rules.rule2: • The participant can design the mehendi on his/her hand or on some others hand.

posts.title: GUESS THE SONG
posts.description: Participants can play in teams of 2 members. Guess the song by its instrumental music, thumbnails & images.

rules.rule1: • Participants can play in teams of 2 members.
rules.rule2: • Guess the song by its instrumental music, thumbnails & images.
rules.rule3: • Each team will get 10–15 seconds to guess after the tune or image is shown.
rules.rule4: • Use of mobile phones, earphones, or any online assistance is strictly prohibited.

posts.title: LOGO GUESSING CHALLENGE
posts.description: Identify the logo from clear images, partially blurred & cropped images.

rules.rule1: • Individual or team participation of up to 2 members (as decided by organizers).
rules.rule2: • Identify the logo from clear images, partially blurred & cropped images.
rules.rule3: • Each participant/team will get 10–15 seconds per question to answer.
rules.rule4: • Participants must identify the brand/company/organization name correctly.
rules.rule5: • Use of mobile phones, the internet, or external help is strictly prohibited.
rules.rule6: • Cheating, prompting, or arguments may result in disqualification.

posts.title: BOLLOYWOOD QUIZ
posts.description: The participants have to appear for a quiz test on Bollywood.

rules.rule1: • The participants have to appear for a quiz test

posts.title: PENCIL ART
posts.description: Participants have to design art within one hour.

rules.rule1: • The time for completing the design will be one hour only.
rules.rule2: • Participant have to design the art in one hour. The participants can’t use any frame for designing the art.

posts.title: MEMES BATTLE
posts.description: A battle of humour, not hate! Participants will get 45 minutes to create and submit their meme on-spot.

rules.rule1: • Open to all students (individual or team of max 2 members).
rules.rule2: • Memes must be submitted in JPEG/PNG format. Text should be clear and readable.
rules.rule3: • Participants will get 45 minutes to create and submit their meme on-spot.
rules.rule4: • Keep it fun, friendly, and respectful — it’s a battle of humour, not hate!
rules.rule5: • Use of offensive, abusive, or disrespectful language or visuals is strictly prohibited.

posts.title: POSTER DESIGN
posts.description: Posters must be designed strictly on the given topic or theme announced by the organizers.

rules.rule1: • Posters must be designed strictly on the given topic or theme announced by the organizers.
rules.rule2: • Participants will be given a fixed time duration to complete and submit their posters.
rules.rule3: • The poster must be original and creative. Any copied or AI-generated content will lead to disqualification.
rules.rule4: • Participants must bring their own materials (Laptop, Mobile Phone etc.)

posts.title: ORIGAMI
posts.description: Individual participation only. Participants must create an origami model based on the given theme or topic.

rules.rule2: • Participants must create an origami model based on the given theme or topic.
rules.rule3: • Each participant will be given a fixed duration.
rules.rule4: • The model must be originally folded by the participant — no pre-made or pre-folded designs allowed.
rules.rule5: • The paper size can be A4 or square. (provided by organizers)

posts.title: AD-MAD SHOW
posts.description: Participants can play in teams of 2-4 members. Each team will get 2-4 minutes to perform their advertisement.

rules.rule1: • Participants can play in teams of 2-4 members
rules.rule2: • Each team will get 2-4 minutes to perform their advertisement.
rules.rule3: • The advertisement must be original, creative, and relevant to the given product or idea.
rules.rule4: • Content must not include any vulgar, political, religious, or offensive material.
rules.rule5: • If any background music or visuals are needed, teams must submit them in advance.
